author: Financial News
title: Moving from T+2 to T-instant
text:
Moving from T+2 to T-instant By Special Report: Fintech News: The blockchain issue New initiatives often give new hopes of solving longstanding problems. In the securities domain, there have been many complaints about the operational complexity and the high cost of post-trade processing, the business of making sure securities are transferred after a trade and the right payments are made to the right owners on time.
